attributes.action: Undertake a new "Manhattan Project" to solve Britains Energy Crisis once and for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose the formation of a working party of top UK scientists whose goal will be to solve the energy crisis once & for all.

There are many promising technologies out there - this group could investigate them  all with a view to commercialising the most promising.

This would also then make Britain a world leader in energy science.
